name: Paper Adventure Refolded
description:
This is a remake the first game I ever published, and is my first game on Itch.io.

Use the mouse to interact with the menu, hold the mouse button down in game to make the plane fly straight and release to make the paper plane rotate in the other direction. Beware the bomb clouds, and keep an eye on the time!

Also the exit game button does not work in the browser, sorry about that. Just hit escape, whatever you do, DO NOT HIT THE EXIT BUTTON.
